plot: Before moving abroad, sixteen-year-old Isidora spends a few days at her childhood countryside house. Lost in the summer's stillness, she fears the coming changes...
title: Leto bez meseca
plot_es: Before moving abroad, sixteen-year-old Isidora spends a few days at her childhood countryside house. Lost in the summer's stillness, she fears the coming changes...
